name: Lost Deck
description:
L O S T  D E C K  

Made for the GODOT Wild Jam #35

*There seems to be a bug at the Bunny fight if you collect more eggs after he has already perished*

Please stay in touch with @9thHourGames for the deluxe edition of this game to be released at a later date.

As 9th Hour Films Games, we are proud to publish our second work, and participate in our second game jam. All of the sprites and most of the sounds/music were made during the GODOT Wild Jam period, as well as starting from scratch on a new GODOT project and scripts.

Local Fingerboarder has run into some trouble as skatepark bullies have taken all of his equipment and Decks!

Collect your 5  items (Deck, Griptape, Wheels, Bearings, Tool), and get to your mom's car before you run into anymore trouble!  3 Bosses await, standing between you and some sick Decks to collect.

You must take a non-violent approach in avoiding the enemies and defeating the Bosses, but their negative habits will get the best of them if you strategize well.  Just don't let them get the best of you,  or you'll get Wasted.

  • - Procedural Generated Levels
  • -3 Unique Bosses that increase with Difficulty
  • -Original Music Score and SFX
  • -Collect unique Decks and complete your collection

Controls

Space bar : Insert Coin

Arrows : Moving (Up, Down, Left, Right)
